title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using the 'outjar' option in ajc, the resulting jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file, even though there is a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside the source directory.
OB: Currently, if the 'outjar' option is used, the resulting file should be a valid jar file, which means it should include the necessary MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: However, when I call 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', an output file is created with a .jar extension, but it is not a valid jar file because it does not have a MANIFEST.MF file inside it.
SR: To resolve this issue, the 'outjar' functionality should be updated to include the MANIFEST.MF file from the source directory in the resulting jar file.
